text:
‘Tis the season to snag some of the hottest deals of the year. Black Friday is fast approaching and we’re working hard to find the best prices on the things you need. From the best Black Friday deals on baby gear and kids’ essentials to must-haves for moms and dads, you’ll find it all right here.

And because it’s no longer just a day (or two if you count Cyber Monday), many of the deals are already live. Who said you had to wait until after Thanksgiving to get shopping? From now through December, keep checking back for updates. We’ll be sure to share them as we find them!

The best part? You don’t have to leave your couch to check off those wish lists, mama.

Whether you’re shopping for gifts or just trying to score a deal on some of those big ticket items for Christmas, many top baby brands are having fantastic sales now through the holiday. Here are some Black Friday sales that you just can’t miss.

Looking for more gift ideas? Check out all of our holiday gift guides!

Best Black Friday deals on baby gear 4Moms The tech-based baby brand is holding their biggest sale of the year from 11/14-11/28. Save big on some of their award-winning swings, bassinets and more. Take $100 off the new MamaRoo Multi-Motion Baby Swing with code BFCMSWING

Take $150 off the MamaRoo Sleep Bassinet with code BFCMSLEEP

Take 30% off the Breeze Playards, Connect High Chair, RockaRoo, MamaRoo4, and Cleanwater Tub with code BFCM22 SHOP Cradlewise Launched just last year it’s already proven to be one of the most impressive pieces of baby gear on the market. At once a bassinet, crib and built-in video baby monitor, it knows when your baby is about to wake up and begins to bounce ever-so-gently to lull them back to sleep. (After all, isn’t that the exact movement you instinctively do to get them to sleep in your arms?) Paired with the Cradlewise app, you can check in on your little one from down the hall or across the country. You can also monitor their sleep and movement stats and play white, pink or brown noise to help them sleep more soundly. From now until 11/28 you can save up to $700 depending on your cradle delivery date. (It pays to plan ahead!) SHOP Lalo You may already know Lalo for their brilliant grow-with-me high chair and award winning play table and chair set– both of which are a minimalist parent’s dream come true. Launched by two dads in 2019, Lalo is on a mission to simplify the baby-stuff-buying process with thoughtfully designed products you actually want to have around. From now until 11/30 take up to 40% off sitewide. SHOP Guava Family From their innovative travel crib to their rugged (but lightweight!) jogging stroller, the Guava Family baby gear makes life with littles a whole lot easier. From 11/14-12/3 they’ll offer the following discounts: $100 Off the Roam Strollers + Accessory Sets
